tooltip.chooseBasket: Choose the size of your basket
tooltip.addSomething: Do you want to add anything?

cabas.wannaCabas: Hi, your cart is well filled! Would you like to add <1>{{strongcabas}}</1> for {{price}} chf?
cabas.dontForgetWithoutPastas: Otherwise, don't forget to bring your own container to collect your basket.
cabas.dontForgetWithPastas: Otherwise, don't forget to bring your own containers to pick up your basket and pasta.

resume.thereIsTheContent: Here is the content of your cart:

authentication.dialogAlreadyConnected: I see that you are logged in as <1>{{strongemail}}</1>, is that you?
authentication.dialogHaveAccount: Do you already have an account here?
authentication.dialogCreateAccount: Do you want to create an account?

shipping.dialogAskWhere: Finally, where and when do you want to collect your order?

redirection.dialog: Great! Last thing you have to do is pay for your order via our payment platform.
